title: 'Enemy from Within' - Military Against Democrats
summary: Trump called Democrats 'enemy from within' and bigger threat than Russia/China. Said military should be used against 'radical left lunatics' on Election Day. Repeatedly suggested Democrats committed treason punishable by death.
keyFacts: 'Enemy from within' rhetoric - called Democrats bigger threat than Russia/China
Said military should be used against 'radical left lunatics' on Election Day
Repeatedly suggested Democrats committed 'treason' - a capital offense
Shared posts calling for 'military tribunals' for Democrats
Retweeted accounts calling for Obama, Clinton, Biden to face 'justice' for 'treason'

sources.text: Truth Social archives, Media Matters documentation
